title: John II, Count of Oldenburg
text:
John II, Count of Oldenburg (; died c. 1314 or 1316) was <a href="Count%20of%20Oldenburg">Count of Oldenburg</a> from 1275 until around 1301. He was the son of <a href="Christian%20III%2C%20Count%20of%20Oldenburg">Christian III, Count of Oldenburg</a> and wife Hedwig von Oldenburg in <a href="Wildeshausen">Wildeshausen</a>.
Marriages and issue.
John married twice. His first marriage was to <a href="Elisabeth%20of%20Brunswick%20and%20Lunenburg">Elisabeth</a>, the daughter of <a href="John%2C%20Duke%20of%20Brunswick-L%C3%BCneburg">John, Duke of Brunswick and Lunenburg</a> and <a href="Liutgard%20von%20Holstein-Itzehoe">Liutgard von Holstein-Itzehoe</a>. His second marriage was to Countess <a href="Hedwig%20of%20Diepholz">Hedwig of Diepholz</a>. John had five children:
